disruptive_desc_part_1: Step into the future with SlatPay, the platform designed to revolutionize your approach to project management, product control, and financial transactions . We merge innovative technology with user-friendly design,
disruptive_desc_part_2: Providing an efficient, comprehensive solution for producers, co-producers, and customers alike. With SlatPay, you're not just part of the digital transformation - you're leading it.
feature_affiliates_desc: Expand your reach with our Affiliates Showcase feature. Display your products to other users and encourage them to try to become affiliates. It's a great way to maximize your product's visibility and expand your sales potential.
feature_checkout_desc: Make informed decisions and boost your sales with our checkout analysis tools. They provide deep insights into consumer behavior, enabling you to optimize your strategy  and reach your audience more effectively.
feature_currency_desc: Through our currency changer feature, you can sell your project in the currency of your choice and accommodate customers from all around the world. When creating a project, select your preferred currency and sell in the current currency. Don't let borders limit you.
feature_real_time_desc: Experience the power of real-time with SlatPay. Whether it's managing your team, tracking sales, or monitoring project progress, our real-time functionality keeps you updated every step of the way.
features_desc: Discover the power of SlatPay's comprehensive, user-friendly features, designed to transform your project and financial management.
feature_send_desc: Simplify transactions with our Send Money feature. With a few clicks, you can transfer funds quickly and securely. Whether you're paying suppliers or rewarding your team, we make financial transactions a hassle-free task.
get_ahead: Get ahead, be part of the change. Sign up for our waitlist now and secure your place at the forefront of online education.
global_desc:
With our powerful platform, you can transcend borders, connect with customers worldwide, and seize opportunities in diverse markets.

From expanding your customer base to exploring new horizons, SlatPay empowers you to unlock your full potential in the dynamic global marketplace.
global_title: Unleash your Potential in the Global Arena
icons_analytics_desc: Gain valuable insights into your sales and growth patterns with our robust analytics.
icons_checkout_desc: Increase conversions with our streamlined and user-friendly checkout process.
icons_desc: Unlock the potential of your info products with SlatPay. Effortless selling, wider reach, and unprecedented growth are just a step away.
icons_effortless_desc: Enjoy a user-friendly interface designed to make selling your info products effective.
icons_reach_desc: Expand your customer base with SlatPay's global marketplace
icons_secure_desc: Rest assured with our secure and reliable transaction processing.
icons_tasks_desc: Experience unparalleled organization and efficiency with our comprehensive tasklists.
icons_title: More Than a Platform - It's Your Marketplace
less_fees_desc: Experience a game-changing 5% sales commission + $0.50. More profit, less worry. Discover the SlatPay difference.
main_desc:
Intrigued? Your success story starts here. Join our exclusive
waitlist to get a head start on a more streamlined future.
slattv_desc: With SlatTV, the innovative arm of SlatPay, host and sell your infoproducts, eBooks, courses, and more. Transform your wisdom into wealth on a platform designed for today's digital pioneers. Elevate your offerings, enrich others, and expand your possibilities.
slattv_guide_desc: Discover the potential of your expertise with SlatTV, the pioneering platform from SlatPay. Designed for the digital trendsetters of today, we provide a space to host, sell, and share your infoproducts, eBooks, courses, and more. This guide will walk you through the process of creating and uploading your content, much like YouTube, but optimized for infoproducers. Learn how to transform your wisdom into wealth, uplift your offerings, empower others, and open up new possibilities.
slattv_guide_title: A Guide to Creating and Uploading Content
step_into_desc: SlatPay is more than a tool, it's a leap towards the future of e-commerce and project management. Stay tuned.
website_desc: SlatPay offers seamless payment solutions for your business. Secure, reliable, and user-friendly.
website_tags: payment, online payment, payment gateway, secure payment, business payment
